page.title: 20 Credits
page.content: P. 1 Leisure Pursuits by C. Hopkinson P. 2 Lea Green by Suzanne Mackie P. 3 Florence Nightingale by C. Berry P. 4 Lea Wood Hall by Matthew Collis P. 5 Wheatcroft Hamlet by E. Holmes P. 6 Lea Fair by H. Wadeson & P. May P. 7 My Day in Holloway by K.Pardner P. 8 Lea School 1862-1873 by S.Hodgson P. 9 Lea Hurst by Graham Mumby P. 10 Simon Groom by Lucy Brook P. 11 The Local Habitat by W. Brealey P. 12 Alison Uttley by P. McMichael P. 13 Lea Carnival by Kay Lynam P. 14 Manor Farm by Joy Lorenz P. 15 Mr Gorden Lorenz by J. Baguley P. 16 My House by Edward Wright P. 17 News by K. Taylor & B. Hampson P. 18 Longball by Marie Lowe P. 19 My House by Emma Sykes P. 20 Credits
